name: Charlie Heli Sniper Shot: 3D Mobile Kill-er Strik
name_original: Charlie Heli Sniper Shot: 3D Mobile Kill-er Strik
description:
Pilot a gunship Charlie Heli Sniper Shot and engage in the best simulation action FPS missions across the urban landscape. Select from a variety of top latest battle sniper rifles that will help you make the kill shot! Are you ready to shoot to kill in the mafia wars?
Charlie Heli Sniper Shot combines real time and engages you with stunning 3D graphics with modern sniper weapons in engaging urban war scenarios that provide you with an addictive realistic chopper shooting experience that gets you thoroughly addicted!

Your swat tactics and the right amount of gunfire and the timing of your attack are very critical to end the adventure of the international drug mafia onslaught! You will be provided with powerful weapons from the military that can wreak destruction upon the enemy soldiers.

You have to choose the best strategy to take down multiple fleeting targets. So are you ready to take on the challenge and protect fellow police officers, swat team members and take on the meanest criminals that are willing to go to any length to destroy the peace of the city? You are a one man army!

Charlie Heli Sniper Shot : 3D Mobile Kill-er Strike Features
- Complete missions divided in regions, and play special Most Wanted missions!
- Enjoy realistic gun simulation and animation!
- Select from a wide range of lethal sniper weapon guns, each with unique characteristics.
- Challenge yourself and race against time to get rewards on strategic kills
- Full addictive control of latest shooting rifles
